nodes.text: The Peace Park was a decorative garden and the location of the Memorial Shrine in the city of Sundari on Mandalore.

During the Clone Wars, a bomb placed by a member of the violent Mandalorian splinter group known as the Death Watch severely damaged the Peace Park's Memorial Shrine as Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and Duchess Satine Kryze were walking through the garden.

During the Takeover of Mandalore, the Peace Park was one of the targets for the gangsters of the Shadow Collective. Ziton Moj led a team of Black Sun foot soldiers and Pykes there, attacking civilians and Mandalorian police alike.
